body: Kids & Youth       Some fun trail things to do:   Earn your Star-Spangled Banner Trail Junior Ranger badge! Learn how.   Can you "hold the fort" and save Baltimore from the British? Check out Fort McHenry's new interactive game.   Test your flag smarts and singing skills at the Smithsonian! Visit the National Museum of American History's Star-Spangled Banner website.   "Vote" for or against declaring war on Great Britain in Fort McHenry's new interactive game.   A Sailor's Life for Me! Experience life aboard the USS Constitution, known as "Old Ironsides" during the War of 1812, in this online game and interactive website from the USS Constitution. You can also play it on your iPad.   Explore some of the history you'll discover along the trail.
title: Star-Spangled Banner National Historic Trail: Kids & Youth
